definition: to exceed/to overtake/to surpass/to transcend/to pass/to cross/ultra-/super-
tritium/3H/radioactive isotope of hydrogen having 2 neutrons in its nucleus, so atomic weight 3

sentences.english: If you are overweight or obese, your doctor should test you periodically for a pre-diabetic condition called glucose intolerance.
sentences.chinese: 如果你超重或肥胖，你的医生会检测你得糖耐量。

sentences.english: Dieting is of great benefit to the over-weighted people.
sentences.chinese: 节制饮食对超重的人是非常有益的。

sentences.english: However, its role is more that of a super-heavy tank destroyer.
sentences.chinese: 怎么说呢，他时常扮演一个超重型的坦克杀手角色。

sentences.english: Losing weight doesn’t have to be the priority with an overweight child.
sentences.chinese: 减肥并不一定是超重儿童的优先选择。

sentences.english: Parcels over 70 pounds require overscald rates.
sentences.chinese: 包裹超过七十磅重须付超重费率。

sentences.english: Find out if your overweight is leading to high  cholesterol, as it is known to do.
sentences.chinese: 发现你的超重是否如所知的那样，已导致胆固醇偏高。

sentences.english: A： I always turn the mega bass on when I listen to rock.
sentences.chinese: 我听摇滚乐时总是喜欢打开超重低音。

sentences.english: Do I have to pay excess baggage charges, if it is over 15kg?
sentences.chinese: 如果超过15公斤，我得付行李超重费吗？

sentences.english: It's not surprising that these folks weighed more and had larger waists.
sentences.chinese: 这并不稀奇，那些人为什么会超重而且十分胖。

sentences.english: I was visiting an aunt who had always been heavy.
sentences.chinese: 我去看望一位婶娘，他的身体一直超重。

sentences.english: The Digital Luggage Scale allows you to pack smarter and avoid paying overweight luggage fees.
sentences.chinese: 数字行李秤让你更聪明的包装，避免支付超重行李费。

sentences.english: Some students no longer even drink water because they are afraid of gaining weight.
sentences.chinese: 为了不超重，有的学生上课前连水都不敢喝。

sentences.english: Kids with BMIs in the 85th percentile or higher are considered overweight.
sentences.chinese: BMI在第85个百分位数及以上的儿童确认为超重。

sentences.english: It's a little overweight. You have to pay extra.
sentences.chinese: 有点儿超重了，您得付超重费。

sentences.english: It's a little overweight. You have to pay extra.
sentences.chinese: 有点儿超重了，您得付超重费。

sentences.english: Corpulence is a sensitive word for most overweight people.
sentences.chinese: 对于多数超重的人来说，肥胖是一个敏感的词。

pinyin: shen1 ti3 zhi4 liang4 zhi3 shu4

definition: (lit. and fig.) to carry a heavy load/to carry a heavy burden
to sustain/to bear the weight (of the upper storeys in architecture)/load-bearing
to put on weight/to get fat
